title: CSS Minecraft
excerpt: A Minecraft clone made with pure HTML & CSS – no JavaScript.
text: There is no JavaScript on this page. All the logic is made 100% with pure HTML & CSS. For the best performance, please close other tabs and running programs. View on GitHub, CodePen, benjaminaster.com ⚠︎ Your browser does not support the CSS :has() pseudo-class, which is needed for this site to work. Please update it: Chromium version ≥ 105, Safari version ≥ 15.4 or Firefox version ≥ 121 is required.
html:
There is no JavaScript on this page. All the logic is made 100% with pure HTML & CSS. For the best performance, please close other tabs and running programs.

⚠︎ Your browser does not support the CSS :has() pseudo-class, which is needed for this site to work. Please update it: Chromium version ≥ 105, Safari version ≥ 15.4 or Firefox version ≥ 121 is required.
